segments.text: I hear you and James are engaged at last .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , lovely . Where's the wedding going to be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well .. we're not sure yet , probably in St.Albans .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , your parents live there , don't they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where are you going to live after you're married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're going to buy a flat or a small house somewhere in South London .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you going to give up your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , probably but I may look for another one when we're settled in .
segments.speaker: S2
